name: Monster Girl 1,000
description:
Welcome to a world of monster girls, where you play as an orphaned warrior living in a village solely populated by these unique creatures. Your mission is to breed with 1,000 monster girls at the request of the goddess of fertility.
Joining you on your adventure are elf girl Bessie and demon girl Ray. Together, you'll explore a magical world full of danger, adventure, and plenty of monster girls to discover and breed with. Engage in steamy encounters with your harem as you battle fierce foes, explore uncharted territories, and create lasting memories with unique and charming monster girls.
With a vast and diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique abilities and personalities, there's never a shortage of new and exciting experiences to be had. Encounter new challenges and build your harem of monster girls as you progress through a captivating storyline full of twists and turns.
The game features stunning artwork, an amazing soundtrack, and engaging gameplay that will keep you playing for hours. This game is perfect for fans of lewd RPGs and visual novels.
75+ romanceable girls, all with unique appearances, personalities, and stories
100+ sex scenes covering a wide range of juicy scenarios
30+ hours of content in a fantasy story epic
World map with a variety of unique locations to visit
Pregnancy-themed harem with 18 characters
Intense turn-based combat
